title: Loss Prevented?

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body: Hi, I was playing as {{champion:68}} top then all of a sudden my Mid Laner, ADC and Jungler all disconnect at the same time.. they all came back 5 minutes after eachother.... and Because of this We lost the game. We went into the after game lobby and it said "Loss Prevented" at the top...Riot please explain... I also  wanted to ask did anyone else have this trouble? Bit disappointed... {{summoner:14}}

replies.body:
Hey there,

Loss prevented was enabled due to a semi-widespread outage affecting some ISP's.

>Bit disappointed... 

Can I ask why you are disappointed that no penalty was applied due to your loss? Loss-prevented prevents any LP loss, prevents a loss being applied to your w/l ratio, etc.
